txt.en: 'Don't you have anything better to do? I'm sure there is work to be done elsewhere.'
'Oh the fireworks show! Yes, I will hurry there once I finish with my tasks.'
'Yes, it will be much better to see sparks in the sky, instead of coming from my anvil.'
'I hope you have a permit for those... oh. Is the firework show tonight? Well then, carry on.'
'Ah ha! So it's been you whose been digging up my turnips! You're in for it now, you swine!'
'If I ever catch you in my garden again, I'll have you for a rasher of bacon! That goes for the lot of you.'
